page.title: 08HOME LIFE IN EAST SWINDON
page.content: The home is very important place because it is where people settle down and have{families.}Some families have a cat,dog,or a hamster. In a home you have a{kitchen}where you cook meals.There are bedrooms,bathroom and a livingroom. In homes we have {safety}appliances with {electricity}like fuses, otherwise if you plug into a socket and load more than 13 amps it could blow up. Most houses have a front and a back garden. The domestic activities in the home are watching television washing before meals and going to bed.There are four meals in one day breakfast,lunch, dinner and supper.
